title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 4 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 4 2022
description:
Clay and Buck wish you an excellent Friday and know they will have one as they continue broadcasting from Houston affiliate KTRH and, as Clay said, look forward to the "big event tonight, Texas barbecue, beer, and bourbon. Is going to be a lot of fun. Michael Berry, Jesse Kelly, Buck Sexton and myself to meet hopefully over a thousand of you." C&B dig deep into reckless Senator Lindsey Graham calling for (even doubling down on his call for) Putin's assassination. Former Obama CIA director Brennan says Putin's days are numbered. Buck says he's a "loon," who should not be listened to. Manchin, who C&B call the most reasonable Dem, on gas prices. How much are we willing to pay to punish Putin? Blinken says Putin is violating principles of war. C&B talk to fired-up callers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
